Articles.Content:
MinmusCollaborationProject

What is the Minmus Collaboration Project?

The Minmus Collaboration project has 2 goals. A space station and a base. The Space station will be where space ships are built using extraplanetary launchpads. It will also have a science station, small plane, and some other modules. The base is mainly where ore is.

Does this support NovaPunch (or any other mod)?

Sorry, no Novapunch. However we support Extraplanetary launchpads and Kerbal Engineer. I might add Kethane support depending on how things go, but don't depend on it and build an entire array of Kethane modules because the chance I get Kethane for the project is quite low.

How do I help?

First, post that you want to participate. In your post, say what you want to build, and say if it's for the space station, base, or something else. We will need more than plain modules. Also say what role you want.

What if I don't have Kerbal Engineer or Extraplanetary launchpads?

No big deal. Just don't use it. However, we will need some people to have EP launchpads.

This sounds stupid!

You sound stupid

I don't want to build a module. What other ways can I help?

There's quite a few things that we will need besides modules. We need a spaceplane, that can be docked at a space station in low Minmus Orbit, we need a good booster to lift modules into space, and we will also accept other small vehicles that can fly around the space station as well as being able to dock.

How do I get my module/vehicle/booster into the project?

Well first, apply for the project simply by saying you want to help and say what you want to build. I will PM you if you are accepted with a save of the space station and a booster vehicle if needed. You must test your module landing on Minmus or getting it to a solid 10km to 20km orbit WITHOUT HyperEdit. I have HyperEdit, but it takes away some of the fun to just teleport everything into place. After you test it, you must PM me (Clockwork13) your .craft file so I can add it to the station.

ROLES:

SPACE STATION:

-Scientist

Makes science modules and hitchhiker complexes.

-Engineer

Makes general modules. No making science modules or hitchhiker complexes for this job, that would take away the scientist's work.

-Metal Engineer

Makes mining plants, EP launchpads and storages for Ore, Metal, and rocketparts.

-Inspector

Makes sure everything looks and is working right. May require EP launchpads to inspect EP modules.

BASE:

-Scientist

Makes science modules and hitchhiker complexes.

-Engineer

Makes general modules. No making science modules or hitchhiker complexes for this job, that would take away the scientist's work.

-Metal Engineer

Makes mining plants, EP launchpads and storages for Ore, Metal, and rocketparts.

-Inspector

Makes sure everything looks and is working right. May require EP launchpads to inspect EP modules.

-Explorer

Explore the surface of Minmus with rovers and spaceplanes.

-Capsule Launcher

Launches capsules back to the station with scientific data

OTHER

-Booster Engineer

Makes boosters to lift modules

-Aeronautics engineer

Makes spaceplanes. 1 needs for space station use, others used for taking stuff besides modules to the space station. (like new kerbalnauts)

-Ground Engineers

Ground vehicles like rovers and cars.

-Inspector

Makes sure everything looks and is working right.

People involved right now:

NONE

Edited May 1, 2014 by Clockwork13
Improved looks

Why do my threads like this always end up with 69 votes? ._.

And yes, I'll upload images of the core as soon as possible
